content.body: Is anyone still researching base64 utilities?
bakkot updated the base64 proposal just last week. https://tc39.es/proposal-arraybuffer-base64/
content.formatted_body: bakkot updated the base64 proposal just last week. https://tc39.es/proposal-arraybuffer-base64/

content.body: Thanks, it seems that has the relevant issues that need to be solved as well
I'm getting closer to understanding (and improving) how WebKit handles all of this which should help eventually driving those to some resolution
